Play Thorn and Balloons – Fun Physics-Based Balloon Popping

Thorn and Balloons – Unblocked is a satisfying physics puzzle game where you launch a thorn ball and try to burst every balloon on the screen. Master your aim, adjust your power, and use walls, gravity, and perfect angles to clear each level.

What is Thorn and Balloons?

Thorn and Balloons is a casual yet strategic mobile-style game where you must pop all balloons by launching a spiked ball. Each level features new arrangements, obstacles, and angles that challenge your timing and precision.

How to Play

  • Swipe to aim: Drag back to adjust launch power.
  • Change the angle: Swipe diagonally to modify firing direction.
  • Release to launch: Fire the thorn ball and let physics take over.
  • Bounce off surfaces: The ball can ricochet off walls to hit hard-to-reach balloons.
  • Clear all balloons: Pop every balloon to pass the level.

Key Features

  • Physics-Based Gameplay: Every shot relies on realistic bouncing and gravity.
  • Satisfying Balloon Popping: Burst balloons in creative and fun ways.
  • Touch-Based Controls: Perfect for mobile and browser play.
  • Unique Levels: Each stage offers a different puzzle layout.
  • Casual & Relaxing: Easy to play yet challenging to master.

Why Play Thorn and Balloons?

If you enjoy physics puzzles, simple mechanics, and addictive challenge-based gameplay, Thorn and Balloons delivers a fun and satisfying experience for all ages.

Launch, Bounce, and Pop!

Take aim and burst every balloon. Can you clear them all?
